attributes.action: Stop any plans to build a severn barrage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The river severn is a truely unique wildlife habitat of world wide significance. Building a severn barrage will distroy much of this. What is the point of creating "green" energy if the price we pay is environmental vandalism and distruction of important eco systems.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop any plans to build a severn barrage."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15981.asp

Prime Minister's Office
